# This file is autogenerated
title: lookupUserByPhone
description: Overview of the lookupUserByPhone method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/signer/classes/AuthClient/lookupUserByPhone
---

Looks up if a phone number is registered in the system.

## Import

```ts
import { AuthClient } from "@alchemy/auth";
```

## Usage

```ts twoslash
const user = await authClient.lookupUserByPhone("+15551234567");
if (user) {
  console.log("User exists with orgId:", user.orgId);
} else {
  console.log("Phone number not registered");
}
```

## Parameters

### phoneNumber

`string`

- Phone number with country code to look up

## Returns

`Promise<{ orgId: string } | null>`
Organization ID if phone exists, null otherwise
